articles.title: Federal election: Anthony Albanese backflips on campaign promise by walking out on media - The West Australian
articles.description: After pledging in Tasmania that he was ‘not Scott Morrison’ and he wouldn’t run away from scrutiny, Labor leader and PM hopeful Anthony Albanese today only fronted the media for eight minutes.

articles.title: New Zealand interest rates jump 0.5pc in 'highly uncertain' environment, ASX lifts on surging oil price - ABC News
articles.description: New Zealand announces its fourth straight interest rate hike, US consumer prices rise at their fastest pace since 1981, while surging commodity prices boost the Australian share market.
articles.content:
New Zealand's Reserve Bank (RBNZ) has raised interest rates by a hefty 50 basis points to 1.5 per cent on Wednesday, a level not seen since June 2019.
